channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Swizzle Fund raises $5M for inaugural fund addressing women’s health and wealth
item.description: There is a new venture fund in town. Swizzle Fund, founded by Jessica Kamada, former COO of the marketing agency Bamboo, has raised just a little more...

item.title: 'Batman: Arkham Shadow' Proves VR Gaming Isn't Just a Gimmick
item.description: The latest Batman outing for Meta Quest shows that, when done well, VR gaming can hold its own with any platform.

item.title: I Used AI to Do All of My Holiday Shopping
item.description: Chatbots aren't very good at picking gifts, but that didn't stop me from burning the planet in a quest for the perfect baking equipment.

item.title: OpenAI 2024 event: How to watch new ChatGPT product reveals and demos
item.description: OpenAI is in the holiday spirit, it seems. The ChatGPT series of reveals, called “12 Days of OpenAI,” will be streamed live at 10 a.m. PT each weekday...

item.title: Arizona’s getting an online charter school taught entirely by AI
item.description: The newest online-only school greenlighted by the Arizona State Board for Charter Schools comes with a twist: The academic curriculum will be taught e...

item.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Review: Fortune and Glory
item.description: A combination of puzzle-solving, bare-knuckle boxing, and brilliant performances recall the best of Indy's adventures.

item.title: Ransomware attack on health giant Ascension hits 5.6 million patients
item.description: The cyberattack on Ascension ranks as the third-largest healthcare-related breach of 2024. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use on...

item.title: 21 WIRED-Tested Gifts for People Who Need Some Sleep (2024)
item.description: Sweet dreams are made of these, from special lamps to noise machines.

item.title: Why Can’t You Switch Seats in an Empty Airplane?
item.description: Yes, the weight distribution on an aircraft really does affect how well it flies. Our physics guy explains.

item.title: Lerer Hippeau files to raise Fund IX
item.description: Lerer Hippeau, one of New York's most prolific and A-list VC firms, has filed to raise its ninth fund, according to an SEC filing made Wednesday. © 20...
